5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: (Abdullah) bin Abbas (r.a.)'dan: şöyle demiştir : Nebi (Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem), geceleyin namazı ikişer rek'at kılardı

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ رَكْعَتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the (voluntary) night Prayer is two by two
